name: Essential UI - Figma Ui Kit
description:
Essential Ui is a Figma components library with +100 ready to use ui components.


Find +100 Free Figma + HTML Landing Page Templates


+100 Figma Ui Components

4 Button styles

We have created four button styles with three main sizes, small, medium, and large. Moreover, every button is an auto-layout component.


18 forms

Enjoy a set of 18 form components to design all your forms effortlessly. Youâ€™ll find two different form styles with two sizes each, standard and large.


10 Tables and Lists

Design sidebars and dashboards elements promptly with our tables and lists Components.


14 Navbars

We have included navbars that work with a wide range of designs, from a basic landing page to a complex eCommerce website.


27 Cards

Find a broad range of polished cards built for blog posts, features elements, testimonials, and pricing.


8 Filters

Filters are made to help you design dashboards interfaces and eCommerce websites. Find rich filters ready to integrate for your projects.


Features :

Mobile First

Every component was designed to fit well on mobile screens.


Easily Editable

You can easily customize the components without any restrictions.


Auto-Layout

Components will fit perfectly your content.


Constraints

Build responsive web interfaces with ease.


Styles

We have a set of colors and font styles to bring more consistency in your design.


Bootstrap Grids

Design layouts that are browser friendly with the bootstrap grid system.
